WorkItem.ClosedComment: All part of the PHP package (zip) on http://www.php.net/downloads.php, should be enabled in php.ini
WorkItem.Description:
In the readme file, website, FAQ, or Requiements page I cannot find links to the appropriate instruction on how to install the php_xml.dll, php_zip.dll, or php_gd2.dll.
Â 
I was able to find php_zip.dll, and php_gd2.dll in the install files for php.  I had to search and find them and redownload php.  I still am no able to find php_xml.dll.  I am still searching.  This process should be documented on your website or links to instructions should be provided.
